page.title: 11TRADE
page.content: In Howick,there is a Post Office which also sells a few grocery items. It is open daily,Monday to Saturday, with early closing on a Thursday. Longhoughton also has a Post office selling other goods;groceries, greetings cards and sweets.There is also a N.A.F.F.I. supermarket which is mainly for the use of R.A.F.families but is also open to the general public.Here you can buy almost anything you require from a tricycle to bacon;from a television to tonic water ;and all at competitive prices. There is one public house in Longhoughton,"The Burnside",which is situated in the middle of the village next to the Post Office and the Police Station.A subsidiary branch of Barclays Bank is open Monday,Wednesday and Friday from 12.30 to 2.30. .
